/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The buildings, painted in shades of gray and brown, are adorned with balconies and awnings, adding character to the cityscape. The trees, lush and green, provide a refreshing contrast to the concrete structures. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the background. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
